feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-24T00:21:59.624070Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;加州所有寄养儿童现在可以免费就读任何州立大学</stitle>; <id>;https://themessenger.com/news/all-foster-kids-in-california-can-now-attend-any-state-col免费lege-for-free</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T22:21:11.058676Z</更新>; <link href="https://themessenger.com/news/all-foster-kids-in-california-can-now-attend-any-state-college-for-free"/>; <author>; <name>;pessimizer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=pessimizer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cms.themessenger.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/UCLA-143309512.jpg" style="width: 220px;身高：137px;" />;<br />;根据本周签署的法律，加州各地寄养儿童和青少年将能够免费就读州立大学和社区大学。新的寄养未来计划将拨款 2500 万美元，用于支付就读加州州立大学、加州大学或社区大学的寄养青少年的学费。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#all-foster-kids-in-california-can-now-attend- any-state-college-for-free" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36839983" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Llama2.c：推理骆驼2个纯C文件</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/karpathy/llama2.c</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T18:21:11.216785Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/karpathy/llama2.c"/>; <author>; <name>;anjneymidha</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anj neymidha</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/karpathy/llama2.c/master/assets/llama_cute.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;使用此代码，您可以在 PyTorch 中从头开始训练 Llama 2 LLM 架构，将权重保存到原始二进制文件，并将其加载到 C 文件中进行推理。C 文件可以通过简单的方法以交互速率运行合理大小的模型。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llama2-c-inference-llama-2-in-one-file-of-pure-c " target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36838051" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;切勿对未知可执行文件运行 ldd</stitle>; <id>;https://catonmat.net/ ldd-仲裁-代码执行</ id>; <更新>; 2023-07-23T21：21：11.219741Z </更新>; <link href =“https://catonmat.net/ldd-仲裁-代码-执行”/>; <作者>; <名称>; xk3 </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user？id=xk3 </ uri>; </作者>; <content type =“html”>; <im g src =“https://catonmat.net/images/catonmat-logo-clean.png”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 88px;" />;<br />;ldd 实用程序可用于确定可执行文件的动态库依赖项，但也可被利用来运行任意代码。本文探讨了此漏洞并提供了一个社会工程场景来获取系统管理员权限。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#never-run-ldd-on-unknown-executables" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36839800" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我声称 Rich Hickey 是错误的 (2020)</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.jonstodle.com/in-which-i-claim-rich-hickey- is-wrong/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T22:21:11.220549Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.jonstodle.com/in-which-i-claim-rich-hickey-is-wrong/"/>; <作者>; <name>;Capricorn2481</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Capricorn2481</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.jonstodle.com/images/code-and-sundry.png" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Rich Hickey 认为，将函数的参数从显式非 null 更改为可能为 null 不应该是重大更改。他还认为，对于收紧返回值的可能值，这应该是一个重大更改。但是，这忽略了这样一个事实：更改函数的内部结构可以改变值的含义，调用者应该适应这一新的现实。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#in-which-i-claim- rich-hickey-is-wrong-2020" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36840127" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;男子因经营儿童色情内容而被判犯有儿童色情罪Tor 退出节点</stitle>; <id>;https://lowendbox.com/blog/man-found-guilty-of-child-porn-because-he-ran-a-tor-exit-node-the-story-of-william-weber/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T17:21:11.221295Z</updated>; <link href="https://lowendbox.com/blog/man-found-guilty- of-child-porn-because-he-ran-a-tor-exit-node-the-story-of-william-weber/"/>; <author>; <name>;h0ek</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=h0ek</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lowendbox.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/william-tor.png “样式=”宽度：220px;身高：220px;“/>; <br />;威廉·韦伯（William Weber）是LowendTalk的长期成员，奥地利政府突袭了与在TOR网络上运行的儿童色情响应有关的。许多计算机，枪支和其他物品被没收，Weber被扣押了，Weber可能会因分布和可能的生产而受到儿童色情的收费。 d-porn-becef-He-ran-a-tor-exit-node“ target =” _ black“>; [摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item./item/item = 3683727272 = 36837273“target="_blank "_blank "_blank”ry_blank“>; </comment </content>; </content>; </content>; base/base/base/int </ints </ints>; base/int </int>; base/hht>; base/hht xml： /feed.xml“>; <title type =“ text”>; OpenBSD：AMD处理器微型模式支持添加到-current </stitle>; <id>; <id>; https://undeadly.org/cgi?action = article = = 20230723185853185853 </id>; </id>; </id>; </id>; </id </id </id </id </id </id </id </id </id </id </id>; 2023-23-07-23-119： “ https://undeadly.org/cgi？action = article; sid = 20230723185853“/>; <aunder>; <namane>; peter_hansteen </name>; <uri>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/news.ycombinator.com/userte in Inters peter_hansteen peter_hansteen peter_hansteen to Intern a interth灰色（jsg@）-Current现在对AMD（AMD64和I386）处理器的微编码（更新）的支持：很高兴看到对AMD侧的支持与Intel的支持（在2018年增加了支持）。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openbsd-amd-processor-microcode-support-added-to-current" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36838511" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;NATS.io 的高性能服务器，云和边缘原生消息传递系统</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/nats-io/nats-server</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T19:21:11.222801Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/nats-io/nats-server"/>; <author>; <name>;Kin rany</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Kinrany</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://repository-images.githubusercontent.com/6443435/ac1f0d00-d7e9-11eb-8193-83a08bd77530" style="width: 220px; height: 110px ;” />;<br />;NATS 是一个简单、安全且高性能的数字系统、服务和设备通信系统。 NATS 是云原生计算基金会 (CNCF) 的一部分。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#high-performance-server-for-nats-io-the-cloud-and-edge-native-messaging-system" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820544" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：我制作了一个连接到您的数据库的 MailChimp 替代品</stitle>; <id>;https://cc.dev</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T16:21:11.223478Z</updated>; <link href="https://cc.dev"/>; <author>; <name>;kashnote</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=kashnote</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.cc.dev/static/images/db/postgres_db_type_logo.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;使用 SQL 连接数据库并直接定位受众。使用我们简单的工具和模板，以平常成本的一小部分发送高质量的营销电子邮件。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-made-a-mailchimp-alternative-that-c​​onnects-to-your-database" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836596" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Icon Buddy – 100K+ 开源 SVG 图标，完全可定制</stitle>; <id>;https://iconbuddy.app/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T17:21:11.224382Z</updated>; <link href="https://iconbuddy.app/"/>; <author>; <name>;mddanishyu suf</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mddanishyusuf</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://iconbuddy.app/icongroup-2-left.png" style="width: 220px; height: 173px;" />;<br />;我们有多种格式可供选择，因此您可以下载您想要的格式的图标。我们有 SVG、PNG、WEBP、JSX、VUE 和 BASE64、URL、CSS 背景截图、HTML 图像标签。我们拥有一切。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#icon-buddy-100k-open-source-svg-icons-very-customizable" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36837442" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hack ernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PLJS – PostreSQL 的 JavaScript 语言插件</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/plv8/pljs</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T20:21:11.225882Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/plv8/pljs"/>; <author>; <name>;alonp99</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=alonp99</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/8a276b6f326c15c50ccc228009144222a992010bf516cb65b21d6ca018f19028/plv8/pljs" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：110 像素；” />;<br />;PLJS是一个紧凑、轻量级的PostgreSQL JavaScript语言插件。它使用 QuickJS 作为 JavaScript 引擎，易于构建和维护。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pljs-javascript-language-plugin-for-postresql" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36838994" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;观众为 Keith Moon (2016) 填词的那晚</stitle>; <id>;https://www.loudersound.com/features/what-happened-the-night-an-audience-member-filled-in-for-keith-moon</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T15:21:11.226634Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.louder sound.com/features/what-happened-the-night-an-audience-member-filled-in-for-keith-moon"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/TmVWRsZw2tkE H8vbrKnmkJ-320-80.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;1973 年 11 月 20 日，基思·穆恩 (Keith Moon) 因吸毒而丧失行为能力后，19 岁的斯科特·哈尔平 (Scott Halpin) 与 The Who 一起打鼓。哈尔平的表演给乐队和观众留下了深刻的印象。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-night-an-audience-member-filled-in-for-keith-moon-2016" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36835735" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么我们不通过从海水中取出盐来获得饮用水？ （2008）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/why-dont-we-get-our-drinking-water-from-the-ocean/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T16:21:11.227378Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/why-dont-we-get-our- Drink-water-from-the-ocean/"/>; <author>; <name>;LinuxBender</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=LinuxBender</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.scientificamerican.com/sciam/cache/file/457A3B34-0166-432A-BC363063E40ED74A _source.jpg?w=590&h=800&C9F62A61-85F0-476D-8070500A94D3A0F7" style="宽度：220px；高度：299px；" />;<br />;由于成本和能源需求较高，海水淡化并不是一种广泛使用的获取饮用水的方法。海水淡化过程涉及打破盐和水之间牢固的化学键，这需要大量的能量。此外，还存在与海水淡化相关的环境问题，例如对海洋生物的影响和浓缩盐水的处置。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-don-t-we-get-our-drinking-water-by-take-salt-out-seawater-2008" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836639" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;石墙和历史港口是生物多样性意想不到的避风港</stitle>; <id>;https://hakaimagazine.com/news/stone-walls-and-historical-harbors-are-unexpected-havens-of-biodiversity/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T20： 21:11.228816Z</更新>; <link href="https://hakaimagazine.com/news/stone-walls-and-historical-harbors-are-unexpected-havens-of-biodiversity/"/>; <作者>; <name>;benbreen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=benbreen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://hakaimagazine.com/wp-content/uploads/body-culture-masonry.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：118px；" />;<br />;旧港口基础设施和石墙为多种海洋动物提供了栖息地，有时甚至比自然海岸线更加多样化。研究结果支持保护海洋遗产地，并可为新水下基础设施的设计提供信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stone-walls-and-historical-harbors-are-unexpected-havens-of-biodiversity" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821123" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;范畴论的不变量解决了数学生态学中的问题 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.maths.ed.ac.uk/~tl/genova/genova_talk.pdf</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T16:21:11.229498Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.ma ths.ed.ac.uk/~tl/genova/genova_talk.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;peanutcrisis</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=peanutcrisis</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;有限度量空间 A 的相似度矩阵是 n × n 矩阵 Z。随着距离从 0 增加到 Infini，A 的基数从 1 增加到 2。 q 阶是 Z 的大小，最大化多样性的分布是 Z 上的权重，归一化为 1。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#an-invariant-from-category-theory-solves-a-problem-in-mathematical-ecology-pdf" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=3683 6358" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;操作面向公众的 API 的建议</stitle>; <id>;https://jcs.org/2023/07/12/api</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T18:21:11.23 0235Z</updated>; <link href="https://jcs.org/2023/07/12/api"/>; <author>; <name>;CharlesW</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=CharlesW</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;在 api.example.com 上提供您的 API，而不是在 example.com/api 上。您的 API 在 TLS 版本和密码方面可能也有更宽松的安全限制，您不希望在处理敏感信息的仪表板网站上放松。今天接受来自某人埋在森林中的 ESP8266 的稍微不符合要求的 API 请求可能意味着您将不得不继续接受几年后发出的相同的不符合要求的请求，通常的代价是必须在升级时在 Web 框架或服务器代码中实施解决方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#advice-for-operating-a-public-faceing-api" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821951" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;JavaScript 中的 SICP</stitle>; <id>;https://sourceacademy.org/sicpjs/index</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T16:21:11.230957Z</updated>; <link href="https://sourceacademy.org/sicpjs/index"/>; <author>; <name>;behnamoh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=behnamoh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;用于学习编程的沉浸式体验环境，由新加坡国立大学计算机学院开发。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sicp-in-javascript" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836729" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">; Elixir 对于 Ruby 开发者来说：三个最重要的区别</stitle>; <id>;https://phoenixonrails.com/blog/elixir-for-ruby-developers-the- Three-most-important-differences</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T16:21:11.231673Z</updated>; <link href="https://phoenixonrails.com/blog/elixir-for-ruby -developers-the-two-most-important-differences"/>; <author>; <name>;arrowsmith</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=arrowsmith</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://phoenixonrails.com/images/blog/red-potion.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Elixir 是一种函数式语言，在语法和代码结构上与 Ruby 不同。它不像 Ruby 那样有类和对象，而是使用模块和函数。 Elixir 也是不可变的，这意味着对象一旦创建就无法更改。此外，Elixir 是一种在 BEAM 虚拟机上运行的编译语言。它很大程度上基于 Erlang，也可以作为解释语言运行。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#elixir-for-ruby-developers-the- Three-most-important-differences" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836258" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;研究揭示了运动神经元疾病的基础疾病的规模</stitle>; <id>;https://medicalxpress.com/news/2023-07-reveals-scale-disorder-underpinning-motor.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T17:21:11.232498Z</updated>; <link href="https://medicalxpress .com/news/2023-07-reveals-scale-disorder-underpinning-motor.html"/>; <author>; <name>;wglb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wglb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2014/motorneurone.png" 样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：162像素；” />;<br />;研究人员发现，受运动神经元疾病 (MND)（也称为肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS)）影响的神经细胞中，数百种蛋白质和 mRNA 分子错位。这种错误定位也延伸到了 mRNA，表明细胞内存在潜在的运输问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#research-reveals-the-scale-of-disorder-underpinning-motor-neuron-disease" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822484" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;化石显示哺乳动物将牙齿插入恐龙</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/science/2023/jul/18/mesozoic-fossil-dinosaur-mammal-fight</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T15:21:11.233949Z</updated>; <link href="https ://www.theguardian.com/science/2023/jul/18/mesozoic-fossil-dinosaur-mammal-fight"/>; <author>; <name>;胡克</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Hooke</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/5eb35cb456f7ba 63ad0fabbbc52c148dbe6a1b42/0_0_4000_3150/master/4000.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px；高度：174px；" />;<br />;一块新发现的化石表明，有时小型哺乳动物能够反击恐龙。这块拥有 1.25 亿年历史的化石显示，一种小型哺乳动物的牙齿陷入了喙恐龙的肋骨中。这一发现挑战了早期哺乳动物只是恐龙猎物的观点。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fossil-shows-mammal-sinking-teeth-into-dinosaur" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36832293" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernew s.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN：我为极简主义者和我自己制作了一个可定制的 iOS 浏览器</stitle>; <id>;https://apps.apple.com/us/app/quiche-browser/id1668363952</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T13:21:11.234844Z</updated>; <link href="https://apps.apple.com/us/ app/quiche-browser/id1668363952"/>; <author>; <name>;nckh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nckh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://is1-ssl.mzstatic.com/image/thumb/Purple126/v4/aa/5b/6c/aa5b6cdf-5 397-6c14-76d4-d23d46f7e34c/AppIcon-1x_U007ephone-0-0-0-0-0-85-220.png/1200x630wa.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;最可定制的浏览器，允许用户个性化工具栏、弹出菜单、地址栏等。它还提供增强的选项卡管理并优先考虑用户隐私。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-made-a-customizing-ios-browser-for-minimalists-and-myself" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36834732" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;不以 .gov 结尾的政府 URL</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/GSA/govt-urls</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T16:21:11.235651Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/GSA/govt-urls"/>; <author>; <name>;not mysql_</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=notmysql_</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/54ed074dedf72f8393de6ec4e562dc158cabc4409e86da5d3b41729e216ba7b2/GSA/govt-urls"样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：110像素；” />;<br />;此存储库包含不属于 .gov 和 .mil 域的公共政府管理域的列表。欢迎更新和补充。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#government-urls-that-don-t-end-in-gov" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836649" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：家庭学生的高中成绩单生成器</stitle>; <id>;https://www.greatbookshomeschool.com/free-high-school-transcript-generator</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T18:21:11.236386Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.greatbookshomeschool.com/free-high-school-transcript-generator"/>; <作者>; <name>;jkurnia</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jkurnia</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;我们使用标准的美国未加权 GPA 计算方法，其中 GPA 计算为四分制的平均成绩，并按每门课程的学分值加权。高中成绩单生成器是 Great Books Homeschool 提供的免费工具，这是一个基于好书的可定制家庭教育课程。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-high-school-transcript-generator-for-homeschoolers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36837512" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;呼叫中心工作人员与人工智能的战斗</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/19/business/call-center-workers-battle-with-ai.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T15:21:11.237090Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/2023/ 07/19/business/call-center-workers-battle-with-ai.html"/>; <author>; <name>;elsewhen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=elsewhen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/07/19/multimedia/19AI-Customer-Service-Jobs-wjvm/ 19AI-Customer-Service-Jobs-wjvm-articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="宽度：220px；高度：275px；" />;<br />;人工智能 (AI) 在客户服务角色中的崛起引起了员工的担忧，其中包括 AT&T 呼叫中心工作人员 Ylonda Sherrod。她担心被人工智能技术取代以及对她的工作和生计的潜在影响。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-call-center-workers-battle-with-ai" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36835571" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;女王吉他手和天体物理学家布莱恩·梅将发布小行星 3D 图集</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/science/2023/jul/23/queen-brian-may-3d-atlas-bennu-asteroid</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T18:21:11.237770Z</updated>; <link href="https://www .theguardian.com/science/2023/jul/23/queen-brian-may-3d-atlas-bennu-asteroid"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/64b306bb8fb d5ccdd85612664b89a2143429d59e/0_0_1190_1125/master/1190.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px；高度：209px；" />;<br />;亚利桑那大学行星科学专家但丁·劳雷塔 (Dante Lauretta) 和皇后乐队主音吉他手布莱恩·梅 (Brian May) 合作创作了第一个完整的三维小行星贝努 (Bennu) 图集。这本书的标题是《Bennu 3-D：小行星解剖》，其中包含来自 Osiris-Rex 任务的图像和数据，并将提供对生命起源的见解。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#queen-guitarist-and-astrophysicalist-brian-may-to-release-3d-atlas-of-asteroid" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36837695" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;电解电容器：概述、拆解和实验[视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MAP-VA1m-A4</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T13:21:11.238452Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch ?v=MAP-VA1m-A4"/>; <作者>; <name>;daneel_w</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=daneel_w</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/MAP-VA1m-A4"frameborder="0"allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat .io/# electrolytic-capacitors-overview-teardown-and-experiments-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820835" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;丰田一直在开发续航里程为 745 英里的电动汽车固态电池</stitle>; <id>;https://www.topspeed.com/toyota-745-mile-solid-state-battery/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T10:21:11.239170Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.topspeed.com/toyota-745-mile-solid-state -battery/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;achow</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=achow</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static1.topspeedimages.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/toyota-bz4x-2023-1600-1e-fotor-2023072 0175837.jpg" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;丰田开发了一种用于电动汽车的固态电池，续航里程为 745 英里，充电时间为 10 分钟，为整个行业带来了革命性的变化。这一突破表明丰田对后 ICE 未来的态度发生了转变。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#toyota-has-been-developing-a-solid-state-battery-for-evs-with-a-range-of- 745mi" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833836" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
